name: Dr. Lila Tran
background: A visionary geneticist heading an ambitious gene-splicing project to accelerate evolution and cure human diseases. Known for her empathy and willingness to take responsibility.
motivation: To rectify her mistake, protect her creations, and advance science ethically, even at the risk of her own career.

name: Marcus
traits: Cautious, ambitious, opportunistic, loyal yet self-preserving
background: Dr. Tran’s assistant, eager to gain recognition but fearful of consequences. Often torn between loyalty to Lila and pressure from superiors.
motivation: To protect his own future and status, seeking personal credit while balancing ethical dilemmas.

name: Ribbick
background: One of the two frogs mutated into a humanoid. Rapidly adapts to his new identity, questioning his existence and purpose.
motivation: To understand his nature, seek autonomy, and ultimately advocate for the rights of his new species.

name: Croal
traits: Cautious, pragmatic, skeptical, loyal to Ribbick
background: The second mutated frog, less comfortable with his transformation. Fears the unknown and longs for the familiarity of his past life.
motivation: To return to his original form and escape the dangers of human interference, but also to support Ribbick.

name: Dr. Feld
background: The head of the research project, responsible for funding and oversight. Highly concerned with reputation, liability, and project control.
motivation: To protect the project’s integrity and his own career, willing to take drastic measures to contain the fallout and maintain authority.

name: Security Chief (optional: name could be supplied in further development)
traits: Disciplined, relentless, loyal to authority, unsympathetic
background: Leads the lab’s security force, tasked with containing the escaped subjects and enforcing Feld’s orders.
motivation: To effectively neutralize threats to the lab and maintain operational security, regardless of moral implications.
